mapper.select:
SELECT tb_custom_appoint.`U_ID`,service_category.`F_CATEGORY_ID`,tab_user.`sex`, COUNT(F_CATEGORY_ID) AS POINTS FROM tb_custom_appoint, tab_user, tb_order,service_cost,service_category WHERE service_category.`SERVICECATEGORY_ID` = service_cost.`CATEGORY_ID` AND tb_custom_appoint.`ORDER_ID` = tb_order.`ORDER_ID` AND tb_order.`SERVICECOST_ID`=service_cost.`SERVICECOST_ID` AND tab_user.`uid` = tb_custom_appoint.`U_ID`
GROUP BY U_ID,service_category.`F_CATEGORY_ID`
select uid from recommend where group1=#{GROUP1}
select uid from recommend where group2=#{GROUP2}
select count(distinct group2) from recommend
select count(distinct uid) from recommend where group2=#{GROUP2}

SELECT recommend.uid,tb_order.SERVICECOST_ID, COUNT(SERVICECOST_ID) AS points FROM tb_custom_appoint,tb_order,recommend WHERE tb_custom_appoint.ORDER_ID = tb_order.ORDER_ID AND tb_custom_appoint.U_ID = recommend.uid
AND recommend.group2=#{GROUP2} GROUP BY uid,SERVICECOST_ID
SELECT DISTINCT tb_order.STAFF_ID FROM tb_custom_appoint,tb_order WHERE tb_custom_appoint.ORDER_ID = tb_order.ORDER_ID AND tb_order.uid=#{UID}

SELECT DISTINCT tb_order.SERVICECOST_ID,service_project.PNAME FROM tb_custom_appoint,tb_order,service_project,service_cost WHERE tb_order.SERVICECOST_ID = service_cost.SERVICECOST_ID AND service_cost.PID = service_project.PROJECT_ID AND tb_custom_appoint.ORDER_ID = tb_order.ORDER_ID AND service_project.PNAME LIKE '%复诊挂号%' AND tb_order.UID=#{UID} AND tb_order.STAFF_ID=#{STAFF_ID}
select PNAME,service_cost.servicecost_id,service_cost.STAFF_ID FROM service_project,service_cost where service_cost.pid= service_project.project_id and service_cost.servicecost_id= #{SERVICECOST_ID}
mapper.update: update recommend set servicecost_ids = #{SERVICECOST_IDS}, iscoll = 1 where uid = #{UID}
update recommend set group1 = #{GROUP1} where uid = #{UID}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) from recommend where uid = #{UID}

SELECT b.servicecost_id,COUNT(*) cnt FROM tb_order b WHERE b.uid IN (SELECT uid FROM recommend a WHERE a.group1=#{GROUP1}) and b.CREATE_TIME <'2017-09-01 00:00:00' GROUP BY servicecost_id ORDER BY cnt DESC LIMIT 10;
mapper.update: update recommend set top10 = #{TOP10} where group1 = #{GROUP1}
